elements.name: question1
elements.html:
How useful was Module XX?

We're interested in your feedback about how useful the activities in Module XX were for you. As a reminder, Module 1 was made up of two parts: pre-work and a virtual meeting.

Pre-work: 

  1. Introduce yourself on the forum.
  2. Read and compare two versions of a lesson plan to consider the impact of applying specific teaching practices to a given lesson.

Virtual meeting: 

  1. Checking in on how things are going in your class and discussing open questions.
  2. Discussing teaching practices found in the model lesson plan with others.
  3. Engaging in reflection and discussion about how to counsel students who are disengaging in your classroom.

For each activity in this module, we ask that you rate how useful that activity was to you personally in terms of your own learning, development, teaching practice, etc. 

 
N/A 1----2 3----4----5 6----7
I don't recognize this / I don't believe we did this today Not useful to me Somewhat useful to me Very useful to me
